ygData.subject: Re: Mroons Toy
ygData.msgSnippet: Its rare and look fun. But it sucks pretty much. In comparision Ogre war maul 7 damage/s 2H warhammer 5,3 damage/s Mroons toy 5,8 damage/s I d pay max 100pp
ygData.messageBody:
Its rare and look fun. But it sucks pretty much.
In comparision
Ogre war maul 7 damage/s
2H warhammer 5,3 damage/s
Mroons toy 5,8 damage/s

I'd pay max 100pp for it, just cause it looks fun and im a shaman and
really dont melee anyways.

Drokk, da majik trollie
lvl 41, innoruuk


Brian Pifer wrote:
>
> From: Brian Pifer <bpifer@...>
>
> I got a hold of Mroon Toy in a trade. Trouble is that no one knows what it
> is worth, not even the guy I got it off of. One of my guildmates wants it
> and I am trying to find a fair price. Can anyone here help?
> Here are the stats:
> 2HB 20DMG 70DLY
> WAR SHD SHK
> large races only.
>
> Thanks
> Brian
